feed.title: bewCloud Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for bewCloud: v2.2.1
entry.content:
This fixes an issue with Windows clients creating public file shares (introduced in v2.2.0).

Check v2.0.0 for breaking changes in v2.

What's Changed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/compare/v2.2.0...v2.2.1

entry.title: New release for bewCloud: v2.2.2
entry.content:
This improves error messages when some API request fails, across the app.

Check v2.0.0 for breaking changes in v2.

What's Changed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/compare/v2.2.1...v2.2.2

entry.title: New release for bewCloud: v2.2.3
entry.content:
This fails "loudly" on a connection error while running migrations.

Check v2.0.0 for breaking changes in v2.

What's Changed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/compare/v2.2.2...v2.2.3

entry.title: New release for bewCloud: v2.3.0
entry.content:
This includes CardDav and CalDav servers, via a Radicale proxy. More details in https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/pull/80.

Check v2.0.0 for breaking changes in v2.

What's Changed

  • Add CardDav and CalDav servers by @BrunoBernardino in https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/pull/80

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/compare/v2.2.3...v2.3.0

entry.title: New release for bewCloud: v2.3.1
entry.content:
This includes better instructions for OIDC and CalDav/CardDav setup.

Check v2.0.0 for breaking changes in v2.

What's Changed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/compare/v2.3.0...v2.3.1
